text:
Note that we do not cover Ethics (Study Session #1) in our live classes but it is covered
in our on-demand video lectures. Candidates are expected to read the Standards of
Practice Handbook (all of it, including all the examples) multiple times in order to do
well on the Level I exam, which will have 36 questions (15% of the exam) from Study
Session #1. A lot of this material is simply memorization and our candidates have done
very well following this strategy.
